org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf

Interface InputPreProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseInputPreProcessor, BinomialSamplingPreProcessor, CnnToFeedForwardPreProcessor, CnnToRnnPreProcessor, ComposableInputPreProcessor, FeedForwardToCnnPreProcessor, FeedForwardToRnnPreProcessor, ReshapePreProcessor, RnnToCnnPreProcessor, RnnToFeedForwardPreProcessor, UnitVarianceProcessor, ZeroMeanAndUnitVariancePreProcessor, ZeroMeanPrePreProcessor

    public interface InputPreProcessor
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Input pre processor used for pre processing input before passing it to the neural network.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      INDArray backprop(INDArray output, int miniBatchSize)
      Reverse the preProcess during backprop.

        INDArray preProcess(INDArray input,
                  int miniBatchSize)
        Pre preProcess input/activations for a multi layer network
        Parameters:
        input - the input to pre preProcess
        miniBatchSize -
        Returns:
        the processed input

      • backprop

        INDArray backprop(INDArray output,
                int miniBatchSize)
        Reverse the preProcess during backprop. Process Gradient/epsilons before passing them to the layer below.
        Parameters:
        output - which is a pair of the gradient and epsilon
        miniBatchSize -
        Returns:
        the reverse of the pre preProcess step (if any)
